tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE gaming_reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    accessory_name VARCHAR(255),
    reviewer_name VARCHAR(255),
    rating INT,
    review_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE reviews (review_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    accessory_name TEXT,
    user_id UUID,
    review_text TEXT,
    rating FLOAT);

CREATE TABLE ratings (rating_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    accessory_name TEXT,
    user_id UUID,
    rating_value INTEGER);

CREATE TABLE reviews (
  review_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  accessory_id UUID,
  user_id UUID,
  review_text TEXT,
  review_rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE accessories (
  accessory_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  accessory_name TEXT,
  accessory_type TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE users (
  user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  user_name TEXT,
  user_email TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ratings (
  rating_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  accessory_id UUID,
  user_id UUID,
  rating_value INT
)

CREATE TABLE reviews (
  review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  accessory_id INT,
  user_id INT,
  rating FLOAT,
  review_text TEXT
);
